caption: Exclusive 'Pebbles on the Beach' inspired drop earrings, handcrafted in sterling silver, by Gemma Tremayne Jewellery. The earrings features tiny silver pebbles, representing pebbles on the beach, and are perfect for elegant everyday wear.
